greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of e.g.f. (1 - (k-1)*log(1 + x))/(1 - k*log(1 + x)).
formula: T(0,k)=1 and T(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} j! * k^(j-1) * Stirling1(n,j) for n > 0.
mathematica: T[0, k_] = 1; T[n_, k_] := Sum[If[k == 0 && j <= 1, 1, k^(j - 1)] * j! * StirlingS1[n, j], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 01 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jun 12 2020
